Title: Excellent

Name: Kuldeep

Review: I had the pleasure of having Radhi Ji - he was a fantastic driver! He spoke very good English, was knowledgeable of the area & went above and beyond to ensure comfort throughout our journey. Thanks mate!

Name: Sameer222
Title: Udaipur by Gurgaon Taxi service Tajwaycabs
Review: Udaipur Trip by Gurgaon taxi service Tajwaycabs. We visit Jaipur and Udaipur through tajwaycabs car and enjoy

Title: Good

Name: Biswajit
Title: Trip to Agra with Taj Way Cabs
Review: It was a great trip to agra with Taj Way Cabs from Delhi. We enjoyed a lot. Specially the service of Mr.Surendra Kumar was very professional and friendly.The car was very neat and clean. I would definitely refer him for your travel partner.

Name: Mayank
Title: Great service
Review: cab is neat and clean we enjoy our cab service.The driver knew about all the places.Thanks to tajway cabs team.Our driver named radhey drove very perfectly.

Name: Chulbul
Title: Sound and safe
Review: Safe driving. No rough driving or over speeding . Follows all rules and regulations. Can recommend to others

Name: Vijay Singh
Title: Best Trip with the best Driver
Review: We had a 10 Day Trip to Uttarakhand & Mr.Mahipal Singh was our driver for that duration. I would like to MahipalJi for his patience, professionalism & his amazing habit of keeping the car always clean. We were 2 families with 2 little kids & unfortunately one of the kid had motion sickness which needed the car to be stopped every now & then. But MahipalJi never lost his patience & never showed any uncomfort during the entire trip. I hope he also enjoyed the trip as much we did. Thanks again MahipalJi & TajwayCabs.

Name: Alaa
Title: Good company
Review: A very good service and you can trust the company and the employees. They gave us good service and they were on time at the place.

Name: r jakhar
Title: great exprience
Review: cab is neat and clean and profasnail driver must use tajway cabs we enjoy our cab service driver know about all the places thanks tajway cabs team

Name: MEGHA
Title: Amazing experience.
Review: Very impressed by the Taj Way Cabs services. I enjoyed my drive from delhi to hisar. Drivers was also nice and calm. No Hastle in booking ride for myself.

Name: Himanshu
Title: Good experience.
Review: Very comfortable drive,neat & clean car and kamlesh singh was really polite during travel from rishikesh to haridwar.Good service by tajway way cabs.And best wishes for kamlesh from Taj way.Thanks guys

Name: Chitrarup
Title: Musoorie Trip
Review: I, Chitrarup Chakrabarti booked a SUV Inova for a family trip from Delhi to Musoorie, Dehradun, Haridwar, Agra by Tajway Cab. The pilot Radhesham ji was very polite, professional and helpful person. He always support us for a great and memorable trip. With Oldage and kids I completed my trip for the suggestions of Radhesham ji. He always try to understand the problem of kids and oldage in the long distance. I will recommend Radhesham ji to my friend for thair trip also. Tajwab Cab is very economical and cost effective. I completed my trip with happiness. And also missing you Radhesham ji....

Name: Nandini
Title: Sandeep is an excellent driver
Review: Politeness of Sandeep was very humbling. He was very careful while driving a d very customer sensitive. Thanks Sandeep

Name: Naddy
Title: Very Happy Soul
Review: We booked cab for TAJ & Mathura Vrindavan visit. Mr. Radhe Shyam is so polite and he is a call away. He is right at time for pickup, Keeping vehicle neat and tidy. he guided us to the right places and time. Also the price is exactly as they mentioed. Very happy about the trip since it is my Mom Dad first time visit to my place. I always wished for this day in my life. Thank you

Name: Poonam Singh
Title: It was a great experience to travel with Taj Way Cabs...Mr Pankaj Kumar is a very decent, helping and cooperative driver
Review: It was a great experience to travel with Taj Way Cabs...Mr Pankaj Kumar is a very decent, helping and cooperative driver...I recommend him further

Name: Sameer Y
Title: Great experience

The car was clean and the AC was nice in the heat ;)   Thank you for Radhe for the great service and I highly recommend to others!

Name: Manish A

Review: It was good cab service. good driver good driving with clean cab and satisfied experience. i have compared many can services, they gave me best price.

Title: Nice cab
Review: Well maintained and nice cab. Driver was also very good and was driving safely.Only thing which I don't like was he was cribbing a lot that hotel is not providing any place for his stay and at the end of trip he charged extra for his stay over and above of daily driver charges which was not agreed at time of booking.

Name: Yash Vaish
Title: Great experience, Do book cabs from Tajway cabs
Review: We‚Äôve booked our cab from Gurgaon to kasol and it was a great experience and Driver was very polite and cool.

Name: Manoj K
Title: Very helpful and truly professional
Review: We had a nice trip with Surrender(Driver)His hospitality & experience made our family trip to Shimla more easy.Thanks #TajWayCabs

Name: Amruta K
Title: Recommended
Review: We had booked a cab from Tajway for our Uttarakhand tour for 7 days. Service is very good and totally hassle  free.  Driver Radhe ji was polite and was driving safely. He was also keeping car clean. Highly recommended.

Name: Kapil Singh
Title: Tajway is unprofessional and has poor service
Review: The vehicles used in this tajway are old and badly maintained. To add their drivers don‚Äôt stop at the midways or restaurants of customers choice but from where they get free food or commission. The booking agent are rude when you complain and owner Mr Ravinder takes no action to improve his services or drivers he has employed

Name: Sarthak
Title: Recommended
Review: Mr. Radheyshyam was a great driver. The car was in good condition, clean and on time service was provided. Overall it was a good experience, 10/10 recommendüëçüèºüëåüèº

Name: Kabir
Title: Timely Service
Review: We booked a round trip cab for a group of 6. We were offered timely service and experienced driver. He was always there on time for our plans. In short, good and reasonable service!

Name: Satish k
Title: Pathetic Experience
Review: Very bad experience with Tajway Cabs Service. I booked 11-seater traveller, driver reached on time. Initially we liked the driver's behaviour but later we frustrated by his pushback behaviour. I have a small kid who vomited during the trip and driver denied to run the ac till the vehicle is not cleaned by professional car service. I requested to clean it once we reach to our destination. But he denied, put all our luggage outside the traveller, we waited outside near by main road with kids and family. It was very unsafe for kids. It was horrible and pathetic experience we had.During stay in hotel, driver requested to pay for breakfast, lunch and dinner from hotel where we stay as driver said that he can't afford to pay this much amount. Although we accepted his request and paid the amount for his meals. I expected good service from him but it was far below our expectations.Vehicle Condition:  very old (3/10)Driver's behaviour:  not satisfied (1/10)Driver's driving experience, safety, time punctuality: good (9/10)Overall: minus, not recommend for family trip

Name: manoj
Title: Worst Services
Review: Very poor services.  Driver Jagdish yadav was worst in services. All the money took before the trip completion and he simply denied to go for sight seeing.No ownership from the company , they didn't even take my phone call. Please dont fall in the trap.

Name: Sunil
Title: AMAZING EXPERIENCE
Review: Booked a cab from Delhi to Chandigarh through Mr Danish. Initially I was slightly hesitant about the services and timings, however the prompt actions of Dansih build confidence to continue the booking. The cab provided was neat and well maintained. Driver was polite and fully aware of the route. Overall Tajcabs made the journey comfortable and memorable. Looking forward for similar services in future.

Name: Nikita
Title: Safe clean n comfortable
Review: Good n clean cab. Driver was also nice. Comforts trip. I would recommend it to a friend. Driver was helpful in suggesting famous places around n on the way

Review: Mr. Rakesh Tomar was hired by us for trip to Rishikesh from Gurugram. His Toyota Innova was very comfortable and in great condition. He drove very well and was very pleasant and helpful throughout. I highly recommend him for anyone planning a trip like this.

Title: Good

Name: Deshraj123
Title: Agra by Tajwaycabs

Name: Md46755
Title: Nainital tour
Review: Nainital tour was good. We booked car for 4 days nainital tour. Driver was well experience and clean cars recommend

Name: Harshavardhan
Title: Taj mahal
Review: Malik is very helpful guide, he explained us the significance of tajmahal and different events happened. He also gave us the details about the agra and famous things there. I would highlu recommend Malik as guide

Name: Ujjwal Shah
Title: Excellent
Review: Very good service. Mr Prem was very professional and polite. It was great having him as our driver on the trip

Name: Rakesh M C
Title: Amazing
Review: Amazimg professional service and polite driver. Had a great time speaking and learning about local culture and amazing food recomendations

Name: Lalit Khatri
Title: Good service
Review: Good service and on time. Clean cars and professional drivers. Price for one way drop is amazing . Would recommend everyone for the service.

Name: Shabbir
Title: Good Experience
Review: Mr. Manoj Driver is good experience, and professional guys, and bookings are easy to every person, and vehicle are good

Name: Shruti
Title: Tajway Cabs
Review: We had planned a day trip from Delhi to Taj Mahal (Agra).  We came across Tajway Cabs and thought of giving it a shot.Driver, Mr Radhey Shyam, arrived almost on time early at 6.30 am in the morning. Very friendly and professional guy. Well dressed and well behaved too. Drove very smoothly and not at all rash ! He knew well about the roads and also guided us on places that serves really good food on the way. In short he did his job pretty well.Coming to the Cab, very nicely maintained vehicle. We had booked Innova Crysta and when it had arrived we were happy to see a spic and span car. AC of the car was in excellent condition which is so important in this scorching heat.Last but not the least they are pretty reasonable. Do try when you are looking to book a cab (with driver) next time !!!

Name: RRK
Title: Amazing experience
Review: Great experience, neat and clean car, well dressed staff. Had a trip planned to Kangra from 6th -9th Oct 2021, our driver Radhey Shyam is an amazing person, very sensible driver. We had kids with us and had to make frequent stops, he never got irritated and was very helpful. Overall a really good experience.

Name: Praveen
Title: Pleasant, relaxed and easy
Review: Very pleasant experience. Our driver, Mr bunty was thorough professional. On time, zero lags and very good drive experience.

Name: Gurpreet Singh
Title: Trip to Amritsar
Review: Booked Innova Crysta from TAJWAY Cabs. They offered best price in the market.The cab reached the pickup point before time. Cabs hygiene was upto the mark no doubt about that.Mr. Manoj our driver was a pro, polite & humble in nature.Overall the trip experience was very good. I recommend everyone to book their trips with Tajway Cabs.

Name: Kavita Singh
Title: Amazing and comfortable
Review: Our journey went so well with driver Manoj Chaudhary. Specially he was so humble and talkative with us. He was full respectful with each of us. We had many stopages in between still he managed and took us wherever we wanted to go. Over all nice and comfortable experience.

Name: Prem
Title: Trip review
Review: This is the very first family tour to Amritsar and the services we have received from Tajway cabs are very generous. Driver Manoj is very humble and polite. We had a nice trip and very convenient. I recommend this cab service to everyone and hope they have more drivers like Manoj in their business.

Name: TUSHAR_besttraveler
Title: Nice cab service and driver
Review: Our trip driver was Radheyshayamji and throughout the trip we had an amazing experience in the journey. He drove very smoothly and comfortably. Behaviour is also good.

Name: Vivek S
Title: Trip to agra
Review: Our trip agent was chander bhan ji ..he provided 7 seater innova to us trip to vrindavan and agra. Provided vehicle was good . Our driver was anil kumar ji. He is a good person and good driver. Our trip was successful and we enjoyed the trip.

Name: Udit Roy
Title: Gurgaon to Rishikesh and back
Review: Very impressed with Taj Way Cabs service. Neat and clean car in excellent condition . They provided a punctual ,responsible and safe driver Madan Yadav who made our journey all the more pleasant.

Name: Ashmia
Title: our trip with Mr. Madan Yadav was very smooth. very professional and polite
Review: Economic and smooth experience. Professional driver. our trip with Mr. Madan Yadav was very smooth. very professional and polite

Name: Hardik
Title: We went to Shimla for weekend trip. Our driver Bunty was extremely polite and experienced person. He drove the car well.
Review: It was a fun ride .  Driver was on time. We enjoyed the car ride . Reasonably price ans car was also in good condition .

Name: Deep Shrivastava
Title: nice
Review: Bunty is a professional and polite driver. He drives well and have proer knowledge about the routes as well.

Name: Feppy Tayam
Title: We were all girls and also travelling at night we were dropped safely and peacefully and all thanks to their service.
Review: Our journey started from Delhi and destination was Dehradun, driver name was Banty, and he was so polite and gentle behaviour,one of the  most comfortable journey I had experienced with it.

Name: Adi
Title: Good service
Review: Had the pleasure of travelling to Rishikesh from Delhi, with Mr Bunty, who is sincere and punctual. Highly recommended.

Title: Great
Review: It was great having mukesh Verma as our cab driver very responsible and reliable guy he helped us a lot by helping us arriving on time

Title: Excellent service
Review: A very good service i can say. Driver Radhey Shyam has done full justice to his job. In hilly areas of Kullu and Manali, he drove real smooth without taking any risks.

Name: Rinkle
Title: Excellent service
Review: We booked a cab from Delhi to Joshimath, our journey was pretty amazing since the car was spacious and comfortable. Our driver Mr. Surender Kumar was very polite and helpful. His driving skills were too good and drove carefully in the whole journey. He kept our safety his priority. Overall it was a wonderful service.

Name: AJAY S
Title: Wonderful experience, polite and helpful driver
Review: We travelled from Delhi to Joshimath and our journey was wonderful since the car was quite comfortable. Our driver Mr. Surender Kumar drove very carefully and was very polite and helpful in every situation.

Name: Chirag dudhani
Title: Driver- Surendra Kumar
Review: It was a nice journey and glad to go with taj wab cabs. and the driver was also good with his job. .

Title: Well spent week!!
Review: Our journey was really great. We faced a lot of land slides but we managed it really well all because of our driver bhaiya, surender kumar!

Name: Jona S
Title: Good experience
Review: We book a cab from delhi to roorkeeThe driver vipin was very cooperative and care us a lotHis driving skill was so smooth, the car was clean too. We love his service

Name: raj s

Review: We booked crysta for 3 days. We went to mukteshwar and we enjoyed are ride. Cab was very clean and neat. Driver radheysham was very cooperative.

Name: Ateet
Title: Excellent service

Name: AK
Title: Great experience

Name: Rishabh Kumar
Title: Great experience

Review: Seamless booking, on time arrival, neat and clean well maintained cars, trained and professional driver. Overall an excellent experience traveling with Taj Way Cabs. Special thanks to the driver Jagdish Singh for a wonderful journey.
